metadataAttributes.Title: Everyday Excel, Part 3 (Projects)
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: "Everyday Excel, Part 3 (Projects)" is a continuation of "Everyday Excel, Parts 1 and 2".  It is a capstone, projects-based course in which you will apply what you've learned previously to more complex, somewhat open-ended projects (open-ended with respect to the fact that they can be solved in multiple ways).
